text: Anne Elisabeth Jane "Liz" Claiborne (March 31, 1929 - June 26, 2007) was a Belgian-born American fashion designer and entrepreneur. ==Early life== Claiborne was born to American parents in Brussels, Belgium. She moved to New Orleans, Louisiana in 1939. She went on to found the clothing company, which was named Liz Claiborne, Inc. She was the first female CEO and chairperson of a Fortune 500 company. ==Death== Claiborne died in New York City from cancer of the lining of the abdomen. ==Other websites== *Official website *Liz Claiborne Art Ortenerg Foundation Category:1929 births Category:2007 deaths Category:American chief executives Category:American fashion designers Category:Cancer deaths in New York City Category:People from Brussels Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans
title: Liz Claiborne (fashion designer)
